content: (The following statement was released by the rating agency) NEW YORK  October 28 (Fitch) Verisk Analytics  Inc.'s (Verisk) 'BBB+' Issuer  Default Rating (IDR) is not affected by today's announcement that the company is  exploring strategic alternatives for Verisk Health (Health)  its healthcare  analytics business  according to Fitch Ratings. Verisk is exploring alternatives  given Health's lower margins and proprietary data concentration  and greater  competition and capital intensity relative
name: Verisk Analytics Inc
title: Fitch: Verisk Rating Unaffected by Exploration of Strategic Alternatives for Its Healthcare Unit

content: March 10 The following bids  mergers  acquisitions and disposals were reported by 2000 GMT on Tuesday:
name: Verisk Analytics Inc
title: Deals of the day- Mergers and acquisitions

content: Verisk Analytics Inc   a provider of risk assessment data to the insurance industry  said it would buy British energy consultancy Wood Mackenzie for 1.85 billion pounds ($2.78 billion) from buyout firm Hellman & Friedman LLC.
name: Verisk Analytics Inc
title: Verisk Analytics to buy Wood Mackenzie for $2.78 billion

name: Verisk Analytics Inc

content: March 9 Verisk Analytics Inc has agreed to acquire British energy data firm Wood Mackenzie for more than 1.85 billion pounds ($2.79 billion)  according to a source familiar with the matter.
name: Verisk Analytics Inc
title: CORRECTED-Verisk to buy energy data firm Wood Mackenzie in 1.85 bln pound deal -source
